title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.8 - Final order
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16 §§ 753-6.8 - Final order

State Regulations

Based upon the review of a case file consideration of the
nature, circumstances and gravity of the violation, history of prior
violations, effect on public health, safety or welfare and such other matters
as may be required, the commission will issue a final order that
includes: (a) a statement of findings
and determinations on all material issues; and
(b) if a penalty is assessed, the amount of
the penalty and the procedures for payment of the penalty. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 16
§§
753-6.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
